title: Consumer product revenue of Warner Bros. 2018 , by segment
summary: This statistic presents the Theatrical penetration of the Consumer revenue sector in Warner , showing the product of Theatrical and Television revenue Warner in 2018 and with a forecast for 2018 .
In 2018 , Theatrical Bros. made up 4002 % of total revenue Warner of Consumer .
This is predicted to increase 4002 % segment 2018 .
